para.text: 标有“*”的条目必须是国航授权的放行人员签署。
“*”This task must be signed off by Air China authorized dispatch personal.
注意：当进行以下维修工作时,必须严格遵守维护手册及相关维修文件的安全注意事项。
Caution: When you do the maintenance work, you must obey the safety caution of the AMM and maintenance documents.

pos.titleen: Left front Fuselage and Nose Areas

para.text: 目视检查机身静压孔区域(红色标记方框区域内)、迎角传感器周围的机身蒙皮外部、静压孔、空速管、全温传感器、迎角传感器和结冰探测器(如安装)，检查应无损伤，检查该区域内的机身蒙皮上应无外贴补加强板修理，确认该区域清洁。

Visually check static ports zone (in red mark areas) and AOA surrounding areas,static ports, pitot probes, TAT, AOA and ice detector（if installed）for no damage. Make sure no external doublers repair in fuselage skin of these red mark areas, make sure they are clean.
目视检查雷达罩无明显损伤且锁扣正确锁好。
Visually check radome no obvious damage and latches properly locked.
目视检查机身（包括可见的外部天线）无明显损伤，电子舱通风进气活门、勤务盖板和门无明显损伤、丢失，无外来物。
Visually check fuselage (include external antennas) no obvious damage; visually check avionics equipment vent air inlet valve, service panels and doors no damage, missing and foreign objects.

pos.titleen: Nose Landing Gand Wheel Well Area

para.text: 目视检查起落架组件和轮舱内可见部件无损伤、渗漏；轮毂无轮缘损伤、剪切损伤或丢失的连接螺栓；轮胎磨损和损伤在规定范围内。确认临近电门清洁，检查导线无磨损、安装牢固；确认前起落架扭力臂连接销螺帽的保险紧固件完好。

Visually check Gear assy and visible parts in the wheel well are no damage and leakage.Visually check Wheels: no rim damage, sheared/ missed tie-bolts. Tires: the wear and damage does not exceed the limitation. Make sure that the proximitys witches are clean and check the wires no wear,secured.Confirm that the safe fasteners to secure the nut on the center hinge of nose landing gear torque links are in good condition.
检查起落架减震支柱无渗漏，有伸出。（伸出尺寸：0℃以下，H >26mm（1.0236in）；0℃—30℃之间，H > 48mm (1.8897in)；30℃以上，H >72mm(2.8346in)）。
Check shock strut no leakage, and extension. ( DIM: T℃< 0, H >26mm (1.0236in); 0 < T℃<30,
目视检查转弯灯、滑行灯和起飞灯灯罩完好。
Visually check and ensure that the lenses of these lights are in good condition: runway turnoff Lights, taxi and take-off lights.
用MIL-H-5606润湿的软布清洁减震柱镜面后用不脱毛的布或纸擦干（在基地完成）。
Use lint-free cloth wet by MIL-H-5606 to clean sliding tubes and wipe it again with a dry lint-free cloth or paper( Only performed at base station).
目视检查机身右侧静压孔区域（红色标记方框区域内）和迎角传感器周围的机身蒙皮外部，检查应无损伤，检查该区域内的机身蒙皮上应无外贴补加强板修理，确认该区域清洁。

Visually check right static ports zone (in red mark areas) and AOA surrounding areas for no damage. Make sure no external doublers repair in fuselage skin of these red mark areas, make sure they are clean.
目视检查机身（包括外部灯光和可见的外部天线）无明显损伤，电子舱通风排气活门、勤务盖板和门、空调组件冲压空气进气门和出口、饮用水和废水排放口，无损伤和渗漏及丢失、无外来物。

Visually check fuselage (include external antennas and exterior lights) no obvious damage; visually check avionics equipment vent air outlet valve, service panels and doors, ram air inlet flap and outlets, potable water and waste water drain masts, no damage and leakage, no missing and foreign objects.
目视检查发动机吊舱和吊架外表无损伤和渗漏；包皮扣好，各盖板关闭。
Visually check exterior surfaces of engine nacelle and pylon for no evidence of damage andleakage, cowlings and access panels are closed and locked.

目视检查发动机整流罩、进气道、进气整流锥、风扇叶片和出口导向叶片无损伤；目视检查发动机涡轮最后一级叶片可见区域无明显损伤，安装可靠；检查反推、空气动力板、消音板、排气尾锥、排气机匣支板无明显损伤；检查反推在全收回位；检查接近门和排气口无损伤,相应锁扣锁好；检查余油口无堵塞和渗漏迹象。尾喷管内无损伤和金属屑沉积物;T12 (CFM56)或P2/T2(V2500)或T2(PW1100)传感器无明显损伤。

Visually check engine cowlings, inlet duct, nose domes, visible fan blades and OGV for no damage. Visually check the exposed areas of the engine last stage turbine no obvious damage, condition and security of installation. Check thrust reversers, aerodynamic strake, Acoustic lining, exhaust plug, exhaust case struts for no obvious damage. Verify the thrust reverser in fully stowed position. Check access panels and outlets no damage, latches are properly locked. Check the drain mast no obstruction and evidence of leakage. No damage and metal deposit are found in the exhaust duct;the T12 (CFM56) or P2/T2(V2500) or T2(PW1100) sensors are no obvious damage.
在大风或风沙超过5级的天气，或者其它恶劣天气，或者停场时间超过24小时，在发动机上安装布罩(仅在基地和疆内航站执行)。

Install the covers on the engines,when power of the gale, sand blown by the wind exceeds grade 5 or other rough weather, or parking more than 24 hours（Execution only at bases and airports in Xinjiang）.
目视检查缝翼和襟翼、通气油箱空气进口、机翼下表面、副翼、襟翼和襟翼滑轨整流罩无损伤、渗漏、丢失和外来物。
Visually check the Leading edge slats and flaps, Surge tank air intake, Lower wing surface, Ailerons, flaps and flap track fairings are no damage and leakage, missing, no foreign objects.
目视检查放电刷无断裂、无丢失。
Visually check static dischargers no broken and missing.

pos.titlecn: 右主起落架和轮舱区域
pos.titleen: Right Main Landing Gear and Wheel Well Area

para.text: 目视检查起落架组件和轮舱内可见部件无损伤、渗漏；轮毂无轮缘损伤、剪切损伤或丢失的连接螺栓；轮胎磨损和损伤在规定范围内；确认临近电门清洁，检查导线无磨损、安装牢固；起落架减震支柱无渗漏。

Visually check Gear assy and visible parts in the wheel well are no damage and leakage.Visually check Wheels: no rim damage, sheared/ missed tie-bolts. Tires: the wear and damage does not exceed the limitation. Make sure that the proximitys witches are clean and check the wires no wear,secured.shock strut no leakage.
检查左右主起落架减震支柱的伸出量基本一致（差距不超过30mm(1.1811in.)），伸出量最低不少于33mm（1.2992in.）。
Check the MLG shock absorber extension is similarly between left MLG and right MLG (difference is not more than 30mm (1.1811in.)), minimum 'H' dimensionis not less than 33mm (1.2992in.).
检查刹车组件无渗漏。在设置停留刹车的情况下,检查并确信刹车指示杆在限制范围内。
指示杆长度小于或等于
毫米，在基地需要更换刹车毂；在航站等于
毫米时需要更换 刹车毂。
Check and make sure that there are no leaks on the brake units. With the brakes on, make sure that the wear indicators are in the limits.
If dimension L=1mm or less, brake change is required at base. At line station, brake has to be changed at dimension L=0 (flush).
用MIL-H-5606润湿的软布清洁减震柱镜面后用不脱毛的布或纸擦干（在基地完成）。
Use lint-free cloth wet by MIL-H-5606 to clean sliding tubes and wipe it again with a dry lint-free cloth or paper.（Only performed at base station）
目视检查机身（包括可见的外部天线）无明显损伤，勤务盖板和门、排泄管、排放口、外流活门状况良好，无损伤和渗漏及丢失、无外来物。

Visually check fuselage (include external antennas) no obvious damage; visually check service panels and doors, drain masts, drains, outflow valve are in good condition and no damage and leakage, no missing and foreign objects.
目视检查水平安定面和升降舵、垂直安定面和方向舵无明显损伤；可视范围内的放电刷无断裂、无丢失。
Visually check THS and elevators, verticalstabilizer and rudder are no obvious damage s ； tatic dischargers no broken and no missing.
目视检查APU灭火瓶过压释放指示红色圆片在位。
Visually check APU fire extinguisher over pressure discharge indicator red disc in place.
区域的一般情况，确信舱门关闭并锁好，空气进气口盖板正常，排放总管、排 水口、通气口、尾喷口无明显损伤和外来物。

Visually check APU area for general condition, make sure doors closed and secured, the Air intake flap for good condition. Drain mast, drains and vents, exhaustare no obvious damage and foreign object.
目视检查机身无明显损伤，勤务盖板和门无损伤和渗漏及丢失、无外来物。
Visually check fuselage no obvious damage; service panels and doors no damage and leakage, no missing and foreign objects.

pos.titleen: Left Main Landing Gear and Wheel Well Area

para.text: 目视检查起落架组件和轮舱内可见部件无损伤、渗漏；轮毂无轮缘损伤、剪切损伤或丢失的连接螺栓；轮胎磨损和损伤在规定范围内；确认临近电门清洁，检查导线无磨损、安装牢固；起落架减震支柱无渗漏。

Visually check Gear assy and visible parts in the wheel well are no damage and leakage.Visually check Wheels: no rim damage, sheared/ missed tie-bolts. Tires: the wear and damage does not exceed the limitation. Make sure that the proximitys witches are clean and check the wires no wear,secured.shock strut no leakage.
检查左右主起落架减震支柱的伸出量基本一致（差距不超过30mm(1.1811in.)），伸出量最低不少于33mm（1.2992in.）。
Check the MLG shock absorber extension is similarly between left MLG and right MLG (difference is not more than 30mm (1.1811in.)), minimum 'H' dimensionis not less than 33mm (1.2992in.).
检查刹车组件无渗漏。在设置停留刹车的情况下,检查并确信刹车指示杆在限制范围内。
指示杆长度小于或等于1毫米，在基地需要更换刹车毂；在航站等于0毫米时需要更换刹车毂。
Check and make sure that there are no leaks on the brake units. With the brakes on, make sure that the wear indicators are in the limits
If dimension L=1mm or less, brake change is required at base. At line station, brake has to be changed at dimension L=0(flush).
润湿的软布清洁减震柱镜面后用不脱毛的布或纸擦干（在基地完成）。
Use lint-free cloth wet by MIL-H-5606 to clean sliding tubes and wipe it again with a dry lint-free cloth or paper(Only performed at base station).
目视检查缝翼和襟翼、通气油箱空气进口、机翼下表面、副翼、襟翼和襟翼滑轨整流罩无损伤、渗漏、丢失和外来物。
Visually check the Leading edge slats and flaps, Surge tank air intake, Lower wing surface, Ailerons, flaps and flap track fairings are no damage and leakage, missing, no foreign objects.
目视检查放电刷无断裂、无丢失。
Visually check static dischargers no broken and missing.
目视检查发动机吊舱和吊架外表无损伤和渗漏；包皮扣好，各盖板关闭。
Visually check exterior surfaces of engine nacelle and pylon for no evidence of damage and leakage, cowlings and access panels are closed and locked.
目视检查发动机整流罩、进气道、进气整流锥、风扇叶片和出口导向叶片无损伤；目视检查 发动机涡轮最后一级叶片可见区域无明显损伤，安装可靠；检查反推、空气动力板、消音板 、排气尾锥、排气机匣支板无明显损伤；检查反推在全收回位；检查接近门和排气口无损伤
相应锁扣锁好；检查余油口无堵塞和渗漏迹象。尾喷管内无损伤和金属屑沉积物

Visually check engine cowlings, inlet duct, nose domes, visible fanblades and OGV for no damage. Visually check the exposed areas of the engine last stage turbine no obvious damage, condition and security of installation. Check thrust reversers, aerodynamic strake, Acoustic lining, exhaust plug, exhaust case struts for no obvious damage. Verify the thrust reverser in fullystowed position. Check access panels and outlets no damage, latches are properly locked. Check the drain mast no obstruction and evidence of leakage. No damage and metal deposit are found in the exhaust duct;the T12 (CFM56) or P2/T2(V2500) or T2(PW1100) sensors are no obvious damage.
级的天气，或者其它恶劣天气，或者停场时间超过
小时，在发动机上 安装布罩（仅在基地和疆内航站执行）。
Install the covers on the engines,when power of the gale, sand blown by the wind exceeds grade 5 or other rough weather, or parking more than 24 hours
Execution only at bases and airports in Xinjiang
目视检查货舱门内外表面、封严条、门框、接头、临近电门 无损伤和渗漏 无松动和丢失。 检查门开关正常。参照货舱侧壁板上的货网布局图标牌，检查标牌所标识的所有货网在位， 无明显损伤。检查货舱内部无明显的损坏和污物，特别是溢出的液体。

Visually check cargo door internal/external surfaces, seals, doorframes, fittings, proximity switches are no damage, no leakage, no loose and missing. Check the door open/close normally. Refer to the cargo grid layout icon on the side wall of the cargo hold to check that all the cargo nets identified by the sign are in place, no obvious damage.Check the interior cargo compartments for no obvious damage and contaminant, especially the spilled liquid.
检查货舱地板、侧板、顶板、货舱照明正常。
In the cargo compartment check floor, sidewall, ceiling panels, cargo light are normal.
安装所有的起落架地面安全销。
Install the all landing gear ground safety pins.
查看技术记录本、客舱记录本和航后报告（
，并做如下记 录（工作完成后，将 与本工作单附在一起。）
在航后报告上记录测试结果（若测试通过则填
Review technical logbook, cabin logbook and PFR, handle correctly, print PFR and record the following (When the work is completed, attach the PFR to this job card ):
Record the test results in PFR (if the test pass, fill "test ok"; if it did not pass, fill "test fail"), and signed;
确保国籍登记证、适航证和电台证在指定位置，固定牢靠。
Ensure certificate of civil Aircraft registration, standard Airworthiness certification and Aircraft radio station license are in assigned places, mountedsecurely
检查飞行记录本、技术记录本、客舱记录本在位。
technical logbook and cabin logbook are in position.
检查备用飞行记录本、备用技术记录本、备用客舱记录本在位。
Check spare one for flight logbook, technical logbook are in position.
位，同时检查电子主磁堵 弹出指示器无弹出；对于
，在滑油指示窗检查发动机滑油量，若低于或等于满位刻度 与
位；对于 ，在滑油指示窗检查发
动机滑油量，若低于 ，则加到 位。在技术记录本上记录添加量（应估算到小数
点后一位），如未添加滑油则填写

After engine shut down for 5 minutes (within 60 minutes), for CFM56, refill oil to the FULL level, and check the Pop Out indicator of EMCD; for V2500, check the ENG oil quantity, if below or equal to intermediate position between "full" and "1" (U.S. 28 quarts), refill oil to FULL
for PW1100, check the ENG oil quantity, if below"-1" mark, refill oil to FULL.Record serviced oil in TLB (estimate to one decimal place), record "0" if not refilled.
确认滑油箱加油口盖关闭正确牢固。
警告：确保滑油箱口盖关闭并锁定在关闭位，否则可能发生溢油导致发动机停车。
Please make sure the oil tank cover is closed securely.
: Check the oil tank filler cap is closed and make sure that the filler cap is locked, otherwise spilling oil may cause the engine to shutdown.
计算滑油消耗率（本次添加的滑油量除以自上次添加滑油到本次添加滑油期间的总飞行小时 （以飞行记录本上记录的时间为准）），并在 处理措施 栏记录滑油消耗率（精确到 TLB“ ” 小数点后两位）。
如单台发动机滑油消耗率达到：V2500 0.2夸脱/小时，CFM56-5B 0.6夸脱/小时， PW1100 0.15夸脱/小时（应使用轮档时间重新计算滑耗,若仍达到CFM56-5B 0.6夸脱/小时， PW1100 0.15夸脱/小时）,完成以下工作：
目视检查下列部位是否存在非正常的滑油渗漏：发动机整流罩外部、风扇区域、余油口 位置、尾喷区域和放气口区域;
将当天的信息(至少包含机号、发位、滑油添加量、计算的滑耗值及(a)的目视检查结果) 反馈至国航维修控制中心AMC或执管基地MCC。AMC电话（TEL）：0086-10-64595885
夸脱，则需计算“当天的滑耗”（当天该台发动 机滑油添加量除以当天的飞行小时），如达到或超过
当滑油消耗率达到或超过：
小时（或有逐渐增加的趋势，或突然增加），必须按照
手册进行相关的排故 工作并反馈至

Please calculate oil consumption rate (Calculation method of oil consumptionrate: The quantity of added oil divided the total flight hours since the last added on the FLB), and record it in ACT column of TLB (accurate to two decimal place).

:If oil consumption rate of one engine: V2500 ≥0.2 QT/H; CFM56-5B ≥0.6 QT/H;PW1100≥0.15 QT/H,calculate oil consumption rate again with block time, if the oil consumption rate still reaches CFM56-5B 0.6 QT/H，PW1100 0.15 QT/H),the below work should be finished:
Visually check non-normal oil leakage of the following parts: engine cowl external, fan area,engine drain, exhaust area and bleed area.

Feedback the intraday information (at least including: A/C registration number, engine position, replenished oil quantity, calculated oil consumption value, and the visual check result based on (a)) to AIR CHINA AMC or administration base MCC.

For V2500, if the oil quantity added one day for one engine reach or exceed 2 quarts, need to calculate oil consumption rate of the day (The quantity of added oil divided the day of flight hours), if reach or exceed 0.3 QH/T, immediately reported to AMC or administration base MCC.
0.2 QT/H(or a gradual increase, or a sudden increase), troubleshooting according to TSM and feed back to AMC or administration base MCC.
包括撤离绳索、应急斧头、隔热手套、手提灭火瓶、应急电筒、保护性 呼吸设备、机组救生衣

Check the cockpit emergency equipment (including escape strips, emergency axe, insulation heat gloves,portable fire extinguisher, torches, protective breathing equipment, crew life vests) for proper stowage and good condition.
检查风挡和侧窗无超标损伤和无超标起泡，并按需清洁 检查驾驶舱各座椅完好和操作正常 。通电检查驾驶舱门
确信驾驶舱门、门锁系统工作正常。

Check windshield and side windows are no exceed limit damage, no exceed limit bulge and clean them as needed. Check crew seats are in good condition and normal operation. Operationally check cockpit door and lock assy ok.
检查驾驶舱耳机话筒，确信外部无损伤，将机组吊杆话筒和观察员耳机收好。
Check crew boomset and microphone, make sure no damage, store headphones and headsets.
系统工作正常，备用打印纸在位。（在基地完成）
Check and ensure that the ACARS
system is in good condition. Check spare paper of printer is prepared. (Only performed at base station).
）电门操作检查航行灯、着陆灯、转弯灯、滑行和 起飞灯、标志灯、防撞灯
频闪灯和机翼及发动机观察灯。

On panel 25VU, section EXT LT, perform operational test of Navigation Lights, Landing Lights, Runway Turnoff Lights, Taxi and Take-off Lights, Logo-Lights, Anti-collision/Strobe Lights,Wing and Engine scan Lights.
检查机组氧气压力，记录温度和氧气压力。
对于从北京、成都、杭州、上海基地放行的航段，其机组氧气瓶压力不小于
， 执行高高原机场运行时，其机组氧气瓶压力不小于
外站检查时，如机组氧气瓶压力值低于
，而所在高高原机场没有相应充氧设 备，则参考附表四的标准放行飞机（第
的标准只在规定的特殊情况下适用，不作为通用维护和放行标准。
除基地航前（北京、成都、杭州、上海）及高高原机场航线外的航线保障（包括基地过 站及外站的航前及过站） 按充压值列表执行（见第
Check crew oxygen pressure, service as required, and record temperature and oxygen pressure.
For aircraft which will dispatch from Beijing, Chengdu, Hangzhou and Shanghai airport, the crew oxygen pressure
1600PSI; implementation of high plateau airport operation, the oxygen pressure
If crew oxygen pressure below 1650 PSI in the above high plateau airports, but no corresponding replenish device, you can refer to attached table 4
:The standard is only for special condition, can not be as usual maintenance and dispatch standard.
For the other legs except above, the pressure should be in accordance with attached table 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 (Page 9, 10).
PSI(适用于 A319 A320-CEO A321-CEO 左侧氧气压力Left pressure
PSI ( 适用于A320-NEO A321-NEO) 右侧氧气压力Right pressure
PSI ( 适用于A320-NEO A321-NEO) 温度temperature = (OAT+驾驶舱温度CKPT TEMP)/2
检查旅客氧气压力，并记录氧气压力。（适用于除
Check passenger oxygen bottle pressure, and record oxygen pressure. (Except for B6022, B6023, B6024, B6031, B6032, B6033,B2404, B6048, B6213, B6216, B6235, B6236 of A319 planes)
For the plateau routes, passenger oxygen bottle pressure
1600PSI. Implementation of non plateau legs, passenger oxygen bottle pressure
通过客舱窗户或客舱门目视检查机翼上表面及操纵舵面无明显损伤。
Visually check the wings upper surface and control surfaces no obvious damage through cabin windows or cabin doors.
目视检查登机门 勤务门：门框、封严条、门窗、警示带良好；检查滑梯气瓶压力正常（指 针在绿区，应急门的滑梯气瓶压力可通过

Visually check the entry/service doors: Frames, seals, windows, belts for good condition; Check the cylinders pressure of slides are normal (needle in green band, check the cylinders pressure of off-wing escape slides via PTP/FAP).
检查下列紧急设备无丢失、存放良好：应急电台、手提灭火瓶、应急电筒、应急喇叭、手提 氧气瓶及面罩、保护性呼吸设备、人工释放工具。
Check the emergency equipment and proper stowage: ELTs, portable fire extinguishers, torches, megaphones, portable oxygen bottles, oxygen masks, protective breathing equipment, manual release tools.
检查救生衣无丢失，存放良好。
Check life vests no missing and proper stowage.
检查乘务员座椅外观完好，安全带在位
Visually check the attendant seats for good condition, seat belt in place
检查厕所装饰板、门及门锁、废物箱门、烟灰缸、马桶坐垫和座盖、手纸盒完好；检查厕所 内外标志醒目、完好。

Check and make sure the decorative panels, doors and door latches, wastebin doors, ashtrays, toilet seat, covers, roll paper boxes in toilet are in good condition. Check all the marks or signs for inside and outside of toilet are clear, no missing.
检查厕所冲洗正常；水龙头放水和洗手池排水正常，无渗漏；检查厕所灭火瓶压力表指示正 常（指针在绿区）；确信厕所烟雾探测器进口无堵塞。

Check toilet flushing is normal. Make sure the faucet and water bindrain for normal, no leakage. Check toilet fire extinguisher pressure gage, make sure the indication of pressure normal (needle in green band). Ensure smoke detector inlets of toilet are free from any blockages.
检查客舱内话数据系统
Check no amber FAULT lights bright on CIDS. (Only for B6022, B6023,B6024, B6031, B6032, B6033, B2404, B6034, B6035, B6036, B6037, B6038, B2364, B6004, B6014, B6044)
检查前乘务面板上各系统页面故障信息情况，并处理。
Check the Fault message ofrelated system page in the FAP, dispose as required.
目视检查手提氧气瓶压力指针在红色区域内
其面罩应在位无开封。 注：如压力指针低于红色区域，需根据
手册内容确认是否需要更换氧气瓶。
Visual check the portable oxygen cylinder pressure gage shows the needle in the red band, the masks in position and no opened.
if the cylinder gage pressure is below the red band
according to the requirements set by AMM to replace the portable oxygen cylinder.
确认所有例行工作已完成并签署，飞机故障已排除或合法保留。
Ensure all the routine work has been accomplished and signed off, all the faults have been rectified or deferred legally.
填写技术记录本并签署放行。
Fill out the TLB and sign off for dispatch.
绕飞机一周，目视检查所有舱门、盖板已关好。（参考附图） 注：此工作可以在放行工作完成后签署。测试
Walk around A/C and visually check all the doors and service panels are closed and secured. (Ref fig.)
After the dispatching work has been accomplished, this task can be signed off.
